static,
move below, at the end of the class

Simplify compaction logic in TestHiveTransactionalTabl

What does this commit change?
I would prefer for this code to be defensive, especially that it's based on assumptions and hard to test.
E.g. if we want to assume there is no compaction, we should verify there initially is no compaction.
(or leave as it was)
nit: typo in cmt
that should not hold, as we just invoked a compaction
we should verify there is 1 (or fewer?) compaction

commit.message: Generate random table name in TestHiveTransactionalTable
